property.name: browser.fullName
property.value: Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10_14_5) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) HeadlessChrome/76.0.3809.100 Safari/537.36

testcase.name: AppComponent should create the catalog-viewer app
AppComponent page should contain the catalog UI elements
CatalogItemComponent the first catalog thumb should have a background image "/assets/images/thumb/mobile-front-thumb.jpeg"
CatalogItemsComponent catalog thumb icons length should be equal to catalog items length
CatalogItemsComponent click/hover on catalog thumb should update the viewer image
CatalogItemsComponent selected thumb should be highlighted with blue border by applying css class "thumb-select
CatalogViewComponent catalog view should display first img element by default
CatalogComponent should catalog-view load with first item of catalog
CatalogComponent Clicking on previous button should show the previous image
CatalogComponent Clicking on next button should show the next image
CatalogComponent Clicking on next button in the last item should show the first image
CatalogComponent Clicking on previous button in the first item should show the last image
CatalogComponent Clicking on any indicator icon should show the appropriate image
CatalogComponent when slide enabled should change the image for every 3 seconds
CatalogComponent when slide enabled also user interaction like previous, next or indecator should work as expected
CatalogComponent uncheck slide should stop changing the image for every 3 seconds
